New Records: The Chicago White Sox are on track to reach 113 losses, matching the post-1900 record for losses.
Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer, driving in all five of Cleveland's runs in the game.

Post-Match Reflections: The Cleveland Guardians stayed 3 1/2 games ahead of second-place Kansas City in the AL Central.
The Chicago White Sox dropped a franchise-record 14 straight games at home.
